review: This is just what I was looking for to use with my Kindle Fire HD.  It was easy to install on my TV and easy to mirror the movies to the TV.I have had it less than a week and love how easy it is to maneuver the home page and find the movies that I want.  The movies are really close to the clarity that you see in the theater and the sound is wonderful.  Anyone who is a Prime member of Amazon and has a Kindle Fire HD will love this Fire TV Stick

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is a very good value.  However, if you do not have Amazon Prime, or do not want to subscribe to it, this product is not for you.  The picture quality is good--better than it was by hooking up my laptop to the TV with an HDMI connector.  I would recommend this product to anyone who has Amazon Prime.  I am happy with my purchase.
